Detailed Description

Designated class that reads from the proc different parameter values.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

long apmon::lisa_host::ProcReader::diffWithOverflowCheck (  long  newVal,
long  oldVal
)  [inline]
 

Computes the difference between the new value and the old value of a counter, considering the case when the counter reaches its maximum value and is reset.

We assume the counter has 32 bits.

synchronized void apmon::lisa_host::ProcReader::update (   )  [inline]
 

old version

String[] files = parser.listFiles("/proc"); processesNo = null; if (files != null && files.length != 0) { int nr = 0; for (int i = 0; i < files.length; i++) { char[] chars = files[i].toCharArray(); boolean isProc = true; for (int j = 0; j < chars.length; j++) if (!Character.isDigit(chars[j])) { isProc = false; break; } if (isProc) nr++; } processesNo = "" + nr; }

new version

run netstat
